text: Anata gata no ma ni arrā no shito ga iru koto o shire. Kare ga moshi ōku no kotogara ni tsuite anata gata ni shitagattanaraba, anata gata wa kitto fukō ni ochītta kotodearou. Daga arrā wa, anata gata ni shinkō o konomashī mono to nasa re, mata anata gata no kokoro o, sore ni fusawashiku shite, anata gata ni fushinjin to jaaku to hangyaku o kirau yō ni nasa reta. Kore wa tadashiku michibika reta monodearu
